name: vscode-solution-explorer
description: Visual Studio .sln file explorer for Visual Studio Code

vssolution.showMode.description: Show the solution explorer in the activity bar, in the explorer pane or don't show it.

vssolution.solutionExplorerIcons.description:
solution-explorer -> Uses the vscode-solution-explorer custom icons
mix -> use current theme icons for files and folders
current-theme -> Uses the installed icon theme

vssolution.showOutputChannel.description: Show the solution explorer output channel.

vssolution.trackActiveItem.description: Select the active editor file in the solution explorer.

vssolution.netcoreIgnore.description: Folder and filenames to ignore when get a dotnet core project content

vssolution.xxprojItemTypes.description: Type of XML element to put in the xxproj files.

vssolution.xmlspaces.description: Spaces to be used for indenting XML output. It could be a number or an string. ex. "2", " " or "\t".

vssolution.xmlClosingTagSpace.description: Add space at the end of XML closing tag, ex: " />"

vssolution.altSolutionFolders.description: If there is no solution in the workplace root folder, it will search for solutions in any of these folders.

vssolution.createTemplateFolderQuestion.description: Ask to create the solution template folder when none exists.

vssolution.lineEndings.description: Controls line endings of solution and project files.

vssolution.itemNesting.description: Sets whether related items will be displayed nested
